name: Base Recipe - Saison
notes:
### [Base Recipe] A golden, balanced, Saison

**OG**: 1.075   **FG**: 1.011
**ABV**: ~8.8%    **IBU**: ~34

**SRM**: 10.0   **Batch Size**: 2.5 Gal   **Start Water**: 3.63 Gal (30.27 lbs)

#### Grain Bill (total weight: 8.73lb)

| Grain/Sugar  | Weight | Color (°Lovibond) | Gravity | Notes | 
| ------------------- | ------- | ------------- |
| Belgian Pils | 5.07lb | 1.5°L | 1.036 |
| Belgian Wheat | 1.279lb | 1.9°L | 1.037 |
| German Vienna | 2.54lb | 3.5°L | 1.036 |  
| German Carafa Special | 0.044lb | 600°L | 1.0297 |  
| Candi Sugar | 0.5lb | 1.1°L | 1.045 | Add during boil
  
#### Hop Schedule
  
| Variety/Adjunct  | Weight | Alpha Acid (AA%) | Notes | 
| ------------- | -----: | ----- |
| Belma | 11.06g (.39oz) | 11.6% | @ 60m (40m) |
| Belma | 5.39g (.19oz) | 11.6% | @ 20m (15m) |
| Belma | 11.06g (.39oz) | 11.6% | @ 5m (5m) |

##### Optional Additions/Customizations
Midnight Wheat, Roasted Barley or some other 400L plus grain can be used in place of the Carafa - this small amount just adds the signature orange hue to the Saison.
  
  
##### Fermentation
White Labs (WLP565) - Belgian Saison I - 65-75% attenuation, 68-75°F, pitch temp 72°F
  
| Purpose  | Temp | Time | 
| ------------- | -----: | ----- |
| Primary | 68°F | 10d (until SG levels off) |
| Dry Hop | 68°F  | 5d |
| Cold Crash | 38-42°F  | 1-3d |
